title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\Address
name: Address
description:
Resource that represents a address.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Address

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.usage
params.description: The usage of the address. For example, SCHOOL, WORK, PERSONAL.

params.name: data.unstructured_address
params.description: Unstructured address. For example, "1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy, Mountain View, CA 94043", "Sunnyvale, California". Number of characters allowed is 100.

params.name: data.structured_address
params.description: Structured address that contains street address, city, state, country, and so on.

params.name: data.current
params.description: Indicates if it's the person's current address.
